snippet: The Yankees capitalized on two late errors by the Mets to erase a three-run deficit and seal a three-game sweep at Yankee Stadium.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat New York Mets, 5-4, with a walk-off home run by catcher Russell Martin to complete three-game sweep.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees capitalized on two late errors by the Mets to erase a three-run deficit and seal a three-game sweep at Yankee Stadium.

headline.seo: Yankees Sweep Mets as Errors Prove Costly
headline.main: True to Form, Mets Are Sloppy and Yankees Need a Homer
headline.print_headline: True to Form, Mets Are Sloppy And Yankees Need a Homer
